title: Drawing, 1993-121-46, 1950
medium: Brush and gold paint and white gouache over graphite on tan wove paper
inscribed: Inscribed on mount, below lower left corner of drawing, in blue ball point pen:  FABRIC FOR LINING ARK/AND THORA(SIC) MANTEL/ in blue pen (script):  material 48" wide; on mount, below right corner of drawing:  1 1/2=1'0"/ T. Guermonprez.  Typed on gold label attached at upper left verso:  Trude Guermonprez/Pond Farm/ Guerneville, Cal.; in pen and blue ink (script) lower right corner of label:  Aug. 10th, 1950.
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Pattern created by repeating Hebrew character "Shin" (God) in alternating rows (4,3,4,3,3,3) across surface.  Splotches of white gouache in the spaces between the characters.
